data.question: What is the space group of compound 1?

What is the role of alkylene groups in the structure of copper and zinc alkylenebis(phosphonates)?
data.answer: They connect two-dimensional layers to each other leading to three-dimensional structures.

data.question: Does the compound Cu2[(O3PC3H6PO3)(H2O)2]·H2O contain lattice water molecules?
What is the main difference in the layer separation between copper and zinc propylenebis(phosphonates)?
data.answer: The difference is significant in the propylenebis(phosphonates) with values of 8.65 Å for copper and 9.4 Å for zinc compounds.
